articles.author: Boyd Tonkin
articles.title: Salman Rushdie's fearless memoir Knife uses his assassin's blade as a 'reckoning' - Financial Times
articles.description: The writer, who lost an eye and use of his hand in the attempted murder, uses witty prose to overcome the urge to confront his attacker in the flesh
articles.content: In its opening pages, this first-person account of its authors almost-murder delivers a big, shameless joke. On a balmy summer evening before the stabbing attack that left him blind in the right eye,… [+6026 chars]

articles.author: Lexi Carson
articles.title: The True Story Behind ‘Baby Reindeer’: Comedian Richard Gadd Escaped His Stalker - Variety
articles.description: Netflix's 'Baby Reindeer' is based on Scottish comedian, actor and writer Richard Gadd's own experience with a stalker and sexual predator in his 20s.
articles.content:
Netflix‘s “Baby Reindeer” is a new miniseries with a twist. 
“Baby Reindeer,” released April 11, is based on Scottish comedian, actor and writer Richard Gadd‘s own experience with a stalker and sexu… [+1988 chars]
